subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alain Vigneault, who preaches “sticking to the process,” made adjustments all season and tinkered with his lines when the Rangers faced a 3-1 series deficit, but he never panicked.
snippet: Alain Vigneault, who preaches “sticking to the process,” made adjustments all season and tinkered with his lines when the Rangers faced a 3-1 series deficit, but he never panicked.
